alert.note: Alert for Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 7:22PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Teller and northwestern El Paso Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 722 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodland Park, or 21 miles northwest of Colorado Springs, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodland Park, Green Mountain Falls, Divide, Crystola and Florissant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
